divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front patio having coffee I looked to the right and up in the sky was a big bright light.I thought wow that's really bright is it a plane watched for it to move but it didn't then I thought its not a star way to big and bright and it just sat still in the sky.Then the light started to fade away the object moved up a bit stopped the lights faded and it was gone.It was so bright I couldn't make out a shape it was almost hard to focus on because it was that bright.
Summary: was stationary then bright light faded and dissappeared
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Lake Worth
